attributes.action: Stop the sale and advertising for FREE animals on Buy and Sell Groups on Facebook
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to protect animals that are sold or advertised for Free on Buy and Sell groups on Facebook. These pages should be kept for non living items. Most of these animals end up as bait for dog fighters or used as breeding machines for profit. Abused and passed on to different people through out their short lives. We are asking the Government to Ban this on such sites that are meant for selling STUFF not ANIMALS.
